mapper.select: SELECT p.code AS postCode, s.code AS seriesCode, p.user_code, p.price, p.is_paid, p.is_adult, p.is_public, s.is_membership_only FROM post p JOIN series s ON p.series_code = s.code WHERE p.code = ${ postCode }
